description: This file defines the S3Bucket class, which manages AWS S3 bucket resources, including creation, reading, deletion, and listing objects within the bucket.

classes.name: S3Bucket
classes.description: Represents an AWS S3 bucket resource, providing methods to create, read, delete, and list objects within the bucket.

methods.name: uri
methods.description: Returns the URI of the S3 bucket in the format s3://<bucket_name>.

methods.name: get_resource
methods.description: Retrieves the AWS S3 bucket resource object using the provided AWS client.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the S3 bucket with specified configuration and ACLs.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the bucket to be fully created if wait_for_create is set.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the bucket's current state and updates active_resource with its details.

methods.name: get_objects
methods.description: Lists objects within the bucket, optionally filtered by a prefix.
